textBox.richText: Responsible for a phase I effort presented to DARPA (Summer 08) Used Java to extend existing flight analysis software that utilized data mining and causal analysis to validate socio-political data to help military commanders determine proper course of actions (Summer 08) Extended the phase I effort of the previous summer project into MAT (Model Analysis Toolkit), a piece of software that utilizes probabilistic systems and causal analysis to validate socio-political models (Summer 09) Used C# to program an audio cue to alert soldiers of any minefields in their proximity (Summer 09)
